Text: Provide your input to the online study of investing behaviorinvite you to participate in an online survey on investing Your valuable feedback will be used to develop improved investing services available online The results of the survey will be used for marketing research purposes only Respondents will be entered into a drawing to win a Grand Prize of either a Sony DVD player model DVPCD or a Nikon Coolpix Digital Camera each valued at approximately In addition respondents will be eligible to win one of gift certificates to Amazoncom Three certificates will be valued at five will be valued at and will be valued at Please click on the URL listed below to begin your survey rNetLivehtmrC For details on sweepstakes rules please go to rInHouseSweepstakesRuleshtm We are looking for respondents who meet certain criteria which will be determined on the basis of several preliminary questions Therefore it is possible that you may be screened out on the basis of your answers to these questionshowever you will still be entered into the sweepstakes No one will know how you personally answer the survey nor will anyone attempt to contact you because of your participation The survey is being conducted online by MarketTools Inc on behalf of an online investing service We hope you will choose to participate and look forward to getting your input
